objc-dealloc-in-category.description:
Description

Finds implementations of
-dealloc
in Objective-C categories. The category
implementation will override any
-dealloc
in the class implementation,
potentially causing issues.

Classes implement
-dealloc
to perform important actions to deallocate
an object. If a category on the class implements
-dealloc
, it will
override the classâ€™s implementation and unexpected deallocation behavior
may occur.
objc-dealloc-in-category.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
